Quadcrocs

6 HP, 1 Armor, 13 STR, Quad-Bite (d8)

• A crocodile with a second jaw, vertically intersecting with the first.

• Accustomed to deep-sea life, they’ll only leave water if absolutely forced.

• It’s either someone’s leashed pet or seeking a deep enough puddle to sink into and never get this close to the surface again.

category: monsters source: discord
